item.title: 30,000 feet
item.description: One- to two-year goals and objectives What do we want and need to accomplish, specifically, within the next 12 to 24 months, to make the vision happen? Where is your job and personal life going? What will the role youâ€™re in right now be looking like 12-24 months from now, based on your goals and on the directions of the changes at that level? Examples Be debt free Company is 20% profitable Lose 10 pounds Sustain an exercise plan
